defs: not moved or shaken easily; fixed; stable; firm.
(correctly, ಸುಧೆ) 1. the food of the gods; ambrosia.
a sweet yellow liquid produced by bees; honey.
(correctly, ಶುದ್ಧ) 1. cleaned; cleansed; washed; clean; pure; clear.
(correctly, ಶುದ್ಧ) 1. the quality or condition of being clean, spotless; cleanliness; immaculateness.
the quality of being ceremonially pure, holy; holiness.
the quality of being right, correct or acceptable.
the quality that pleases the senses, esp. the sight; beauty.
a standard letter of a language.
(fig.) the quality of being easy (to do, understand, etc.).
to make clean, pure, etc.; to cleanse; to purge.
the power of discerning; keen perception or judgement.
concern, interest or involvement in another's affair, business, etc.
ಸುದ್ದಿಮಾಡು suddi māḍu to make, create news; to be in the news; 2. to cause news spread; ಸುದ್ದಿಸೂರು suddi sūru = ಸುದ್ದಿ - 3.
a man who gathers information and writes reports for publication in a newspaper, magazine, etc.; a news reporter.
a woman who gathers information and writes reports for publication in a newspaper, magazine, etc.; a news reporter.
to (gather and) provide information, news to.
he who carries news,information from one place to another.
a kind of soft, white soil.
the assembly or meeting of gods in the heaven.
the apparent incremental portion of the moon over previous day during its waxing period.
a milky-white, translucent feldspar with a pearly luster, used as a gem (supposed to be formed from the congelation of the mooṇs rays and to dissolve under the influence of its light); the moonstone.
rice boiled in milk or boiled rice mixed with milk.
an earthy clay coloured by iron oxide, usu. yellow or reddish brown: used as a pigment in paints; ochre.
the mythological ocean of milk, the abode of Viṣṇu.
a man who seeks to bring about or brings about reform, as in political, religious or social life; a reformer.
a man who improves a system correcting the faults.
the act of reforming; state of being reformed; reformation.
the reformed condition or the effect of reformation.
a successful, flourishing or thriving condition.
an improving or being improved; improvement; betterment.
the state, quality or fact of being patient; the will or ability to wait or endure without complaint; patience.
a period or occasion of inactivity, as during work or on a journey; rest.
the food of the gods; ambrosia.
reformed by removing faults and defects.
made better by putting a stop to abuses, malpractices, etc.; corrected.
to make better by removing faults and defects; correct; to reform.
to make better by putting a stop to abuses or malpractices or by introducing better procedures, etc.; to reform.
to become better in behavior; to give up bad habits.
to regain health, balance or control; to recover.
to put up with; to tolerate; to endure.
to make feel less disappointed, distressed; to alleviate another's grief; to console.
a man who strictly follows the religious codes or lives a righteous life.
any god whose food is ambrosia.
the ability to learn or understand from experience; ability to acquire and retain knowledge; mental ability; intelligence.
the ability to respond quickly and successfully to a new situation; use of the faculty of reason in solving problems, directing conduct, etc. effectively; intelligence.
a very brave, courageous, fearless man.
a man of very keen intelligence.
the quality of being absolutely dauntless, fearless; marked bravery or courage.
the quality of having very keen intelligence.
the sweetish liquid in many flowers, used by bees for the making of honey; nectar.
the liquid part of a plant, fruit or vegetable; juice.
a leguminous plant, Vigna sinensis ( = V. unguiculata; = V. catjang; = Dolichos sinensis; = D. catajang) of Papilionaceae family.
the middle sized, deciduous Phyllanthus emblica of Euphorbiaceae family.
any god whose food is ambrosia.
a long shaft with a pointed end used for piercing; a spear.
any of several soft-furred, large-eared, rodentlike burrowing mammals of the family Leporidae, having a divided upper lip and long hind legs; a rabbit.
a cutting of the fold of skin that covers the glans of the penis as a religious rite, as of the jews or muslims; circumcision.
a man born in ಸುನಫಾಯೋಗ (see below).
(astrol.) a particular conjugation of planets in which, any of the five planets - Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, Venus and Saturn is situated in the house next to that of the Moon.
a huge sea wave caused by a great disturbance under an ocean, as a strong earthquake or volcanic eruption; a tsunami.
thin; rare; tenuous; not dense or heavy; subtle.
the room, building where goldsmith makes and repairs articles of gold; a goldsmith's shop.
a reading of anything (esp. an appeal of a plaintiff).
that which is decided, fixed or determined properly.
a man having determined, resolved mind; a resolute man.
the plant Marsilea quadrifolia of Marsileaceae family.
an appropriate atonement, expiation for a wrongdoing.
having practical wisdom; prudent; shrewd; politic.
a poem, properly expressive of a single, complete thought, idea or sentiment, consisting of fourteen lines; a sonnet.
good conduct; good policy; prudence; wisdom; shrewdness.
a kind of medicinal preparation for treating certain eye-diseases.
a thin plate of gold or silver.
containing nothing; having nothing in it; empty.
the quality or state of being empty; emptiness.
the profession or the work of a goldsmith.

one of the two great sects of Muslims, which approves the historical order of the first four caliphs as the rightful line of succession to Mohammed and accepts the Sunna as an authoritative supplement to the Koran; Sunni.
the lunar fortnight from the day following new moon-day to the full moon-day, during which the apparent phase of the moon gradually increases everyday.
one of the celebrated mythological mountains.
an office or position offered or held as an honour.
lack of energy, alertness or vigour; slothfulnes; sluggishness.
a good or superior path, road or course.
a good or superior course of action, behaviour.
a woman who tries to draw meṇs attention or admiration by her vanity.
the Brahminee kite, Haliastur indus, an accipitrine bird with long, pointed wings, forked tail and white neck.
(myth.) the king of birds, which is used by Viṣṇu as his vehicle.
the individual soul (when considered diff. from the Supreme Soul).
any of a widespread division (Filicophyta) of nonflowering embryophytes having roots, stems, and fronds, and reproducing by spores instead of by seeds; fern.
(myth.) the mother of Garuḍa, the king of birds and the vehicle of Viṣṇu.
(myth.) Garuḍa, the king of birds and the vehicle of Viṣṇu.
the state or condition of being controlled; control.
a kind of apparatus, made by interweaving strips of bamboo or made of metal, for winnowing; a winnow.
of superior or highest quality; supreme.
the fig tree Ficus virens ( = F. infectoria) of Moraceae family.
ಸುಪೀಕ ತಲೆ supīka tale extraordinary intelligence.
physically well-grown; fat and fleshy; stout; obese; corpulent.
a yogic pusture in which keeping the body on the nape and shoulders, spreading the leg apart, and stretching the hands as to touch the respective feet.
the immanent, dormant energy or consciousness.
(rhet.) carelessness, as one of the thirty three minor sentiments.
sacrificial fire, that is kindled well.
(jain.) one of the sixty three regions above the heavens.
(jain.) a kind of container for things as flowers, sandal, leaves of certain plants, incense, etc. used in worshipping.
a man who is respected in the society; an honourable man.
a woman who is respected in the society; an honourable woman.
installation of the idol of a deity (as in a temple).
(myth.) one of the eight celestial elephants that guard the eight quarters of the earth; the regent-elephant of south-west direction.
physically, emotionally matured; having a sense of responsibility.
(jain.) one of the sixty three regions above the heavens.
the auspicious moment of the day-break.
a greeting used in the morning.
a devotional hymn or song used in the morning prayers.
(myth.) one of the seven flames of the fire (or the Fire-God).
a good opportunity; a favourable circumstance.
a man who supervises; a supervisor.
(mentally) not perturbed; not agitated or excited; cool; calm; tranquil.
a man who is favourably disposed, propitious or gracious.
the state or fact of being satisfied, delighted.
the quality of condition of being favourably disposed; propitiousness; graciousness.
the food presented to an idol or the remnants of food left by a spiritual, reverential person (which is treated as holy, sacred).
(vīr.) a person who receives or has received the sacred 'ಸುಪ್ರಸಾದ' (see ಸುಪ್ರಸಾದ sense 2, above).
a man who is widely renowned; a very famous man.
(jain.) that is absolutely free from insects.
(jain.) a rite performed during the fifth month of pregnancy of a woman.
the literary style that is serious, sober or solemn.
(correctly, ಶುಭ) the quality of being auspicious, benevolent or propitious; propitiousness; auspiciousness.
(gram.) any of a class of words naming or denoting a person, thing, place, action, quality, etc.; a noun.
the lower extremity of the face, below the mouth; the projecting part of the lower jaw; the chin.
the quality of being beautiful, handsome, lovely; beauty; handsomeness; loveliness.
the state or quality of being superior or higher, greater, better, etc.; superiority.
the state or quality of being wealthy; wealthiness; richness.
the state, condition or quality of being well-built, constructed perfectly.
name of a river that rises in Gondwana in the district of Nāgpur and running for 500 miles and joins the river Gange near Pāṭna, in Bihar.
an administrative division of a country; a district; a region.
a man appointed as the admininistrative chief of a district, division or region.
the duty, office, authority of an administrative chief of a district, division or region.
a man who has received the teachings for attaining superior knowledge or wisdom.
to become dense; to be populated thickly.
roughness (as of a piece of cloth or of the hairy skin of animals).
the quality or condition of being dense, thickly populated; density.
the quality or condition of being dense, thickly populated; density.
a pile of things; a heap.
any animal that has a hairy tail.
the hair at the lower part of the abdomen surrounding the external genitals; pubes.
one of the sixteen men participating in a religious sacrifice.
worthy of respect or esteem; estimable; respectable.
the quality of being melodious, musical.
a man having an attractive, well-proportioned, and imposing appearance; a handsome man.
the quality of being beautiful, lovely; beautifulness.
the quality of being melodious; agreeableness of the sound; melodiousness.
a warrior of marked courage, bravery; a valorous soldier.
(fig.) a soldier who is timid or coward.
a gift of land endowed on a valourous soldier.
being free from danger, damage, etc.; safe.
the quality of being auspicious; auspiciousness.
the state or qulaity of being safe.
the quality of being firm, stable.
(jain.) one of the nine regions above the sixteen heavens.
(mus.) name of the one hundred and eight kinds of time-cycles.
name of a sister of Křṣṇa, who married Arjuna.
its fruit used for making pickles.
a woman who speaks correctly and charmingly.
having or characterised by, eloquence; fluent, forceful, and persuasive; eloquent.
that which is said aptly and precisely; a fine speech.
abundance of food; an abundant supply of provisions; plentifulness and cheapness of the necessities of life.
the blossom of a plant; a flower.
a woman who is considered to be auspicious.
a woman whose husband is alive.
(pros.) a metre having seventeen syllables (uuu, u-u, -uu, u-u, u-u, u, -).
the quality or condition of being auspicious, favourably inclined; auspiciousness; propitiousness.
gladness, cheerfulness of mind; a good disposition.
a friendly relation or intimacy; friendship.
a religion that is considered as good.
a good tempered, sympathetic, benevolent person.
(jain.) name of the fifth of the twenty four Jinas (Jaina spiritual teachers).
a man whose mind has a good inclination or tendency; a harmless, benevolent, sympathetic man.
the blossom of a plant; a flower.
a man who is delighted or has the tendency to be joyous.
the grain of the grass Triticum dicoccum; wheat.
much money or property; great amount of worldly possessions; riches; wealth.
(jain.) one of the nine regions above sixteen heavens.
the saccharine secretion of a plant, which attracts the insects or birds that pollinate the flower; nectar.
a good tempered, sympathetic, benevolent woman.
the quality of being attractive, fascinating, charming or beautiful.
a man who makes and sells strings of flowers, garlands; a florist.
the arrow of Manmatha, the Love-God, made of flowers.
to encourage to do, speak, etc.
near in position; close together; approximate.
more or less correct or exact; approximate.
neither very good nor very bad in quality; ordinary; mediocre.
the position that is estimated, guessed, approximated to be nearer, closer (to the fact); approximation.
the quality that is neither very good nor very bad; a mediocre quality.
a good path, road or course.
in literature, a good, classical style.
(pros.) a metrical verse of four lines each having eight syllables (uuu, -u-, u, -).
that is very much agreeable, melodious.
that which has good face or appearance.
a man who has a smiling face.
a man of profound or extensive learning; a scholar; a savant.
a boy or man as he is related to either of his parents; a son.
the Brahminee kite, Haliastur indus, an accipitrine bird with long, pointed wings, forked tail and white neck.
(myth.) the king of birds, which is used by Viṣṇu as his vehicle.
the state or fact of being satisfied, delighted.
the quality of condition of being favourably disposed; propitiousness; graciousness.
a woman having a beautiful face; a beautiful woman.
(pros.) a meter having eleven syllables (uuu, u-u, u-u, u,-).
to make (another to be) quiet, silent.

ಸುಮ್ಮನಿರು summaniru to stop talking; to remain silent; 2. to refrain from doing (something); ಸುಮ್ಮನಿರಿಸು summanirisu to cause to become silent, quiet; 3. to cause to stop doing; ಸುಮ್ಮನಾಗು summanāgu to become silent, quiet; 2. to stop doing (what one is engaged in).
a man who is great in some respect; a man having an extraordinary quality, capability, etc.
the condition of having something in great abundance.
(joy, happiness) to become less or lost.
a playful, coquettish girl or woman.
to become joyful, happy or playful.
a man of high rank, dignity or distinction; a noble or distinguished man.
(fig.) to increase in volume or become larger as a result of pressure from within; to swell.
a protecting or being protected; protection.
the act or practice of being cautious; cautiousness.
a man who guards; a watchman; a guard.
(vīr.) food offered to a diety, preceptor or a Vīraśaiva mendicant.
a very good opportunity, moment or circumstance.
he who fights (in a warfield) well.
Duryōdhana, the anti-hero in Mahābhārata, the great Indian epic.
the act of uttering something indistinctly from anger or wrath.
the art or work of ornamenting fabric with needlework; embroidering; embroidery.
the work of ornamenting fabric with needlework.
to take air into the lungs and let out again; to inhale and exhale; to breathe.
to take in and let out audibly a long, deep breath, in expresing sorrow, fatigue, disappointment, longing, etc.; to sigh.
air taken into the lungs and then let out; breath.
a long breath taken in and let out audibly, in expressing sorrow, fatigue, disappointment, longing, etc.; a sigh.
the air breathed or sighed out.
to cause to sigh; to make one undergo sufferings, agony.
the medium sized, evergreen tree Calophyllum inophyllum of guttiferae family, that grows in the coastal region.
(math.) a symbol for the number thirty three.
(pros.) a metrical foot consisting of three short syllablic instants (uuu); tribrachys.
a hole made in a wall to get into a house by a burglar.
a passage-way under the surface of the earth.
an explosive powder, esp. a blackish mixture of sulfur, potassium nitrate, and charcoal, used as a charge in cartridges, shells, etc., for blasting.
a particular mode of playing the vīṇe, a stringed musical instrument.
to shine brightly; to be lusterous, splendid.
the small, deciduous tree Pterocarpus santalinus of Papilionaceae family with hard wood; red sandal wood.
a mixture of brick pieces and lime, of which a water-proof layer is applied on top of the roof of a building.
the tree Cedrus libani of Coniferae family; Indian cedar; deodar.
free from or guarded from damage, danger or injury; secure; safe.
having escaped danger or injury; unharmed; safe.
taking no risks; prudent; cautious; safe.
the act of guarding, protecting from damage, danger, injury, etc.
he who is in a safe position.
the state or condition that is free from damage, danger, injury, ruin, etc.
(jain.) a mystical art of finding thieves.
the state of being free from death; the state, of quality, of every-living.
the tree Ixora arborea ( = I. parviflora) of Rubiaceae family.
the evergreen tree Ochrocarpus longifolius ( = Mammea suriga) of Clusiaceae family.
in marriages a rite of the bride and bridegroom bathing in water coloured with saffron and turmeric powder.
a short, sword-like weapon with a pointed blade and a handle, used for stabbing; a dagger.
a man armed with a dagger.
an insect of the family of Lampyridae, whose abdomens usu. glow with a luminescent light; fire-fly.
a luminous arc showing the prismatic colours, appearing opposite the sun during rain, caused by the reflection, double refraction and dispersion of the suṇs rays passing through the drops; a rainbow.
